long_description: Made with soft wool for natural comfort, spandex for stretch, and mesh panels where you need 'em most, the men's Ibex Pulse Bike Jersey takes cycling comfort to the next level. Lightweight merino wool and spandex fabric naturally breathes and regulates your temperature, so you feel cool in warm weather, warm in cool weather. Venting mesh panels across the upper chest and down the center back are made of merino wool mixed with durable polyester in a subtle waffle texture. Soft, nonirritating merino wool wicks away moisture and resists odors naturally so you don't have to worry about post-ride funk. 12 in. front zipper has a locking pull. Raglan sleeves ensure comfort and easy motion. 2 elastic-topped back pockets plus 1 zippered back pocket. Ibex Pulse Bike Jersey for men has reflective piping on the left sleeve and a reflective logo on the center back pocket.
short_description: Made with soft wool for natural comfort, spandex for stretch, and mesh panels where you need 'em most, the men's Ibex Pulse Bike Jersey takes cycling comfort to the next level.
